data.description: Implements URI.pm-like framework in pure C
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module implements most of functionality of URI.pm module for
    HTTP and HTTPS protocols and is fully written in C. It is 50-100x
    faster than URI.pm and provides convenient interface. Additionaly
    this module includes several times faster versions of
    encode/decodeURIComponent from URI::Escape::XS
